item.title: 人民币兑美元汇率反弹表明中国的防御政策可能适得其反
item.description: 中国对在岸人民币的铁腕控制正在产生一个意想不到的副作用，它将阻碍中国重振经济的步伐，即削弱出口商的竞争力。【原文：China’s ironclad grip on the onshore yuan is leading to an unintended side effect that would hinder its push to reinvigorate the economy — exporters’ weakened competitiveness.】

item.title: 瑞银财富敦促中国股票投资者保持 "防御性 "投资策略
item.description: 瑞银全球财富管理公司（UBS Global Wealth Management）认为，由于消费依然疲软，而且随着唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）即将提高关税，预计波动性将上升，中国股票投资者应 "保持防御"。【原文：Chinese stock investors should “stay on the defensive side” as consumption remains weak and volatility is expected to rise with higher tariffs by Donald Trump on the horizon, according to UBS Global Wealth Management.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴在节日期间大搞促销活动
item.description: 当许多消费者在节假日大肆采购商品时，阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）却忙于出售资产，即使这意味着要承担损失。【原文：While many consumers load up on goods in the holidays, Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. has been busy selling assets, even if it means taking a loss.】

item.title: 中国将补贴智能手机购买以刺激消费
item.description: 中国将扩大消费补贴范围，将智能手机和其他电子产品纳入补贴范围，这是在外部不利因素增加的情况下促进国内消费的一项举措。【原文：China will expand consumption subsidies to cover smartphones and other electronics, in a step to promote domestic spending as external headwinds pick up.】

item.title: 阿根廷考虑从投资基金或国际货币基金组织获得新贷款
item.description: 据一位高级政府官员透露，阿根廷政府正在评估是否与两家投资基金谈判贷款事宜，或向国际货币基金组织寻求额外融资，以便为在未来几个月内取消货币和资本管制铺平道路。【原文：Argentina’s government is evaluating whether to negotiate a loan with two investment funds or seek additional financing from the International Monetary Fund in order to pave the way toward lifting currency and capital controls in the coming months, according to a senior government official.】

item.title: 拜登周五将阻止新日铁收购美国钢铁公司
item.description: 据三位知情人士透露，乔-拜登总统已决定阻止将美国钢铁公司出售给日本新日铁公司。【原文：President Joe Biden has decided to block the sale of United States Steel Corp. to Japan’s Nippon Steel Corp., according to three people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 印度再次禁止 2001 年股票丑闻中的前经纪人进行前线操作
item.description: 前股票经纪人凯坦-帕瑞克（Ketan Parekh）曾在世纪之交因印度股市史上最严重的金融丑闻之一而震动印度股市，这次又因涉嫌在一家美国基金的交易中提前操作而被证券市场监管机构禁入。【原文：Former stock broker Ketan Parekh, who shook India’s stock market at the turn of the century in one of the worst financial scandals in its history, has been banned by the securities market regulator, this time for allegedly front-running trades of a US-based fund.】

item.title: 监管限制导致印度股票衍生品交易量下滑
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 七位亿万富豪创始人引领印度 2024 年 IPO 热潮
item.description: 今年是印度首次公开募股的丰收年，七位企业家一跃成为亿万富翁，其中许多人都是该国蓬勃发展的可再生能源行业的先行者。【原文：A blockbuster year for initial public offerings in India catapulted seven entrepreneurs into the dollar billionaires league, many of them early movers in the country’s booming renewable energy sector.】

item.title: 中国人工智能公司SenseTime削减新加坡办公空间
item.description: SenseTime 集团公司正在缩减其在新加坡的办公面积，在后 ChatGPT 时代的竞争中苦苦挣扎，从而缩减了曾经的雄心壮志。【原文：SenseTime Group Inc. is reducing its office footprint in Singapore, scaling back once-lofty ambitions at a time it’s struggling to compete in the post-ChatGPT era.】

item.title: 优衣库、7-Eleven 面临销售逆风，尽管消费者消费亮眼
item.description: 优衣库母公司Fast Retailing Co.和Seven & i Holdings是首批在亚洲发布财报的公司。【原文：Uniqlo parent Fast Retailing Co. and Seven & i Holdings are among the first to kick off this earnings season in Asia.】

item.title: 风险厌恶情绪推动避险需求，黄金有望实现周线上涨
item.description: 由于广泛的风险厌恶情绪推动了对避险资产的需求，黄金有望创下 11 月以来的最大单周涨幅。【原文：Gold was on track for its biggest weekly gain since November, as broad risk-off sentiment buoyed demand for haven assets.】

item.title: 美联储储备金降至 3 万亿美元以下，创 2020 年以来新低
item.description: 作为美联储决定继续缩减资产负债表的一个关键因素，美国银行系统的储备金跌破了 3 万亿美元，创下了 2020 年 10 月以来的新低。【原文：The US banking system’s reserves, a key factor in the Federal Reserve’s decision to keep shrinking its balance sheet, tumbled below $3 trillion to the lowest since October 2020.】

item.title: 新加坡监察机构敦促调查新加坡邮政高管解雇事件
item.description: 新加坡投资者监督机构称，新加坡邮政有限公司突然解雇三名高级管理人员，而且他们坚决否认公司对他们的指控，这要求进行独立调查。【原文：Singapore Post Ltd.’s sudden dismissal of three senior executives, and their strong denials of the company’s allegations against them, calls for an independent inquiry, according to Singapore’s investor watchdog.】

item.title: 美国原油库存减少，原油将迎来第二周上涨
item.description: 由于美国原油库存持续下降，原油期货突破了关键的技术门槛，原油迎来了第二周的上涨。【原文：Oil headed for a second weekly gain as US crude stockpiles continued to fall and as futures breached a key technical threshold.】

item.title: 在华尔街沉闷的一天之后，亚洲股市将下跌：市场综述
item.description: 在美国股市连续第五天下跌之后，亚洲股市周五低开，凸显了华尔街今年谨慎的开局。【原文：Asian equities were primed to open lower Friday after US stocks fell for a fifth day, underscoring a cautious start to the year on Wall Street.】

item.title: Zyn 的网络炒作有可能导致尼古丁袋垮台
item.description:
Zyn代表着菲利普-莫里斯公司 "无烟 "战略的成功，同时也是一项重大挑战：该公司如何才能在销售香烟替代品时，避免因诱骗儿童而惹上麻烦？【原文：

Zyn represents success for Philip Morris’ “smokeless” strategy and also a major challenge: How can the company sell cigarette alternatives that aren’t so tempting it gets in trouble for hooking kids?

】

item.title: 美国财政部高级领导人的电脑在最新黑客攻击中被侵入
item.description: 据一位美国官员和另一位熟悉内情的人士称，中国国家支持的黑客入侵了美国财政部高级领导人的电脑，这是近期美国财政部遭入侵事件的一部分。【原文：Chinese state-sponsored hackers broke into the computers of senior US Treasury Department leaders as part of a recent breach of the agency, according to a US official and another person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 汽车租赁初创公司 Turo 的安全团队在致命袭击后缩短假期
item.description: 据一位熟悉此事的人士透露，汽车租赁初创公司Turo Inc.的信任和安全团队的一些员工已经中断休假，以监测和应对拉斯维加斯和新奥尔良致命袭击事件的后果。【原文：Some workers on car-rental startup Turo Inc.’s trust and safety team have interrupted vacations to monitor and respond to the aftermath of deadly attacks in Las Vegas and New Orleans, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: ETF 公司竞相推出下一个 "热门 "加密货币基金
item.description: 交易所交易基金的销售者们正在寻找更有创意、可能风险更大的方式来吸引投资者加入加密货币热潮。【原文：Purveyors of exchange-traded funds are finding ever more creative — and potentially riskier — ways to lure investors into the crypto craze.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的沙利特说：大型科技股的统治可能在 2025 年衰落
item.description: 去年，S&P 500 指数飙升了 23%，其中半数以上都归功于那些高歌猛进的科技巨头，但随着盈利增长的放缓，它们在 2025 年很可能难以主导市场。【原文：The high-flying technology behemoths responsible for more than half of the S&P 500 Index’s 23% leap last year will likely struggle to dominate the market in 2025 as earnings growth decelerates.】

item.title: 足球明星本田的人工智能风险投资基金融资 9800 万美元
item.description: 据彭博社看到的一份文件显示，由前日本国家足球队球员本田圭佑领导的风险投资基金已筹集到约 153 亿日元（约合 9800 万美元）的资金。【原文：A venture-capital fund headed by former Japanese national soccer team player Keisuke Honda has raised about ¥15.3 billion ($98 million), according to a document seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: Meta 的克莱格将离职；卡普兰升任全球事务主管
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司表示，尼克-克莱格（Nick Clegg）将辞去该社交媒体公司全球事务总裁一职。克莱格的副手乔尔-卡普兰（Joel Kaplan）被任命接替他担任政策主管。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. said Nick Clegg will step down as the social media company’s president of global affairs. Joel Kaplan, Clegg’s deputy, was named to replace him as policy chief.】

item.title: 钢铁工人工会称新日铁的 "万福玛利亚 "报价缺乏承诺
item.description: 美国钢铁工人联合会（United Steelworkers union）称，新日本制铁公司（Nippon Steel Corp.【原文：The United Steelworkers union said Nippon Steel Corp.’s latest offer to win presidential approval of its proposed acquisition of US Steel Corp. is a long-shot attempt that fails to commit to maintaining future production.】

item.title: 中国公司将建设几内亚最大的氧化铝加工厂
item.description: 中国国家电力投资集团公司将于今年开始在几内亚建设氧化铝加工厂，而在过去三年中，该公司一直在西非国家生产铝土矿。【原文：China’s State Power Investment Corp. will start the construction of its alumina processing plant in Guinea this year after producing bauxite in the West African country for the past three years.】

item.title: Citadel 提出让客户兑换利润，但鲜有人接受
item.description: Citadel 旗舰策略去年取得了约 15% 的收益，因此 Citadel 邀请客户兑现利润，但绝大多数客户选择将资金留在该多策略对冲基金中。【原文：Citadel invited clients to cash out profits after a roughly 15% gain in its flagship strategy last year, but the vast majority opted to keep their money in the multistrategy hedge fund.】

item.title: 特许学校和学院的财政困难创历史新高
item.description: 2024 年，高校和特许学校出售的市政债券陷入困境，达到创纪录的水平，因为违约的州和地方政府债务数额创下了三年来的新高。【原文：Municipal bonds sold by colleges and charter schools became distressed at record levels in 2024, as the amount of defaulted state and local government debt hit a three-year high.】

item.title: 寒流袭击牛肉供应，牛期货升至创纪录水平
item.description: 由于气温下降和寒风凛冽的天气条件将对本已面临供应紧张的美国牛肉市场造成冲击，牛期货周四攀升至创纪录的新高。【原文：Cattle futures climbed to a fresh record Thursday as falling temperatures and wintry conditions were set to hit a US beef market already wrestling with tight supplies.】

item.title: 中国计划限制电池零部件出口，矿物技术
item.description: 在全球贸易紧张局势日益加剧之际，中国计划加强对用于制造电池组件的某些技术和两种关键金属加工的出口限制。【原文：China plans to tighten export restrictions on certain technology used to make battery components and the processing of two crucial metals amid rising trade tensions globally.】

item.title: Do Kwon 在欺诈案中首次在美国出庭
item.description: Terraform Labs Pte. 联合创始人杜权（Do Kwon）首次在纽约联邦法院出庭，他将面临与 TerraUSD 稳定币价值 400 亿美元的崩盘有关的欺诈指控。【原文：Terraform Labs Pte. co-founder Do Kwon made his first appearance in New York federal court to face fraud charges tied to the $40 billion collapse of the TerraUSD stablecoin.】
